meanings.definition: The act of sending goods or items from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching the shipping of packages at the post office.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in international shipping of products.
meanings.sent3: The shipping of the giant teddy bear made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes followed the shipping trucks as they disappeared into the distance.
meanings.sent5: The shipping of the fragile vase required extra care and attention.

meanings.definition: The transportation of goods or items from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The shipping of goods by sea is a common practice.
meanings.sent2: The shipping industry plays a vital role in global trade.
meanings.sent3: The shipping of the oversized cake was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The shipping of memories from the past brought a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The shipping of supplies to the remote island was challenging but necessary.

meanings.definition: The process of packaging and sending goods for delivery.
meanings.sent1: Proper shipping ensures items reach their destination safely.
meanings.sent2: The shipping process involves labeling and tracking packages.
meanings.sent3: The shipping of the surprise gift was carefully planned.
meanings.sent4: The shipping of happiness in a box brightened her day.
meanings.sent5: The shipping of the new product line required efficient coordination.

meanings.definition: The cost or fee associated with sending goods or items.
meanings.sent1: The shipping for the online order was surprisingly affordable.
meanings.sent2: Free shipping promotions attract many customers to shop online.
meanings.sent3: The shipping for the oversized package was more expensive than expected.
meanings.sent4: The shipping added to the total cost of the purchase.
meanings.sent5: The shipping fee was clearly displayed at the checkout for transparency.
